column5: EMN-Online is a 2 year Master programme in Neurosciences and Biotechnology, delivered entirely online.The programme boasts an international curriculum, with identical courses and evaluation offered by each of the 14 partners from Europe and the South Mediterranean area. Opportunities for taking part in laboratory-based internships are also provided. Students also benefit from innovative and interactive e-learning methods and online tools, e.g. an online teaching platform, a virtual classroom and possibility of virtual discussion and meetings, as well as webinars and animated scientific aids.Master programSummary
